name: Libra
description: Terrelis, known as Libra, embodies fairness and guards the order of all things.

skills.name: Soul Slash
skills.description: Libra slashes forward with a giant blade, dealing DMG equal to 340% of her ATK to enemies in a rectangle.

upgrades.level2: DMG bonus increases to 370% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Reduces the ATK SPD of hit enemies by 20% for 10s. (Unlocks at Lv.101)

skills.name: Verdict
skills.description: Libra summons a scale above a random enemy to judge them, dealing DMG equal to 250% of her ATK and stunning them for 2s.

upgrades.level2: DMG bonus increases to 270% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Increases stun duration by 3s. (Unlocks at Lv.121)
upgrades.level4: DMG bonus increases to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)

skills.name: Cosmic Scale
skills.description: Libra grants herself a shield equal to 270% of her ATK for up to 10s. Increases her ATK by 20% while the shield is active.

upgrades.level2: Shield Strength increases to 300%. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Increases ATK by 25% while the shield is active. (Unlocks at Lv.141)
